      • Video

        public Video(byte[] videoByteArray,
             java.io.File ffmpegBin)
      throws VideoNotFoundException,
             UnsupportedVideoTypeException
        Video POJO
        Parameters:
        videoByteArray - Video as byte array
        ffmpegBin - path to the bin of ffmpeg
        Throws:
        VideoNotFoundException - If no Video found in the stream
        UnsupportedVideoTypeException - If found Video in the stream has not supported codec
